claims.object: The study of interactions between electromagnetic radiation and matter, focusing on the absorption or emission of radiation and the resulting transitions in the quantum state of the system

surface_layer.definition: The study of the interaction of electromagnetic radiation with matter.

deep_layer.mechanism: Analysis of absorption or emission spectra to determine material composition or quantum state.
